the hunter with a feast of his most
prized crop: carrots.

持續保持與幼龍的交流。

context.en_us:
After much effort, he produced a
carrot to top all carrots. It was
packed full of nutrients, sublimely
sweet, and melted on the tongue.
One bite would satisfy any creature.

You can, however, have too much of
a good thing—and this carrot's
biggest flaw was that it was so very,
